derivation: from G575 (ἀπώθομαι) and the middle voice of or (to shove);
kjv_def: cast away, put away (from), thrust away (from)
strongs_def: to push off, figuratively, to reject
outline:
1. to thrust away, push away, repel
  2. to thrust away from one's self, to drive away from one's self
    1. repudiate, reject, refuse
